name: demand-letter-generator-backend
description: Backend serverless functions for Demand Letter Generator

scripts.deploy:prod: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless deploy --stage prod'
scripts.deploy:prod:verbose: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless deploy --stage prod --verbose'
scripts.remove:prod: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless remove --stage prod'
scripts.info:prod: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless info --stage prod'
scripts.logs:prod: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless logs --stage prod'
scripts.logs:function: bash -c 'set -a && source .env.production && set +a && npx serverless logs --function'
